member.name: T:BionicUtilities.NetStandard.Generic.INullObject`1
member.summary: Interface that returns a null object for the implementing type. Implements Null-Object Pattern

member.name: P:BionicUtilities.NetStandard.Generic.INullObject`1.NullObject
member.summary: Instance to return instead of NULL

member.name: P:BionicUtilities.NetStandard.INullObject.IsNull
member.summary: Property to indicate whether the current type is NULL

member.name: M:BionicUtilities.NetStandard.IO.FilePathFilter.FilterFilePathsFromMixedPathsIncludingFolders(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},BionicUtilities.NetStandard.IO.FileExtensions,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Extracts valid paths or paths with a specified extension from a collection of paths. The path collection can be a mix-up of files and folders. In case the path describes a folder, the extension filter will be applied to all containing files.
member.param: A string collection holding folder and/ or file paths filter.
A flagged Enum type that defines one or more extensions to filter from the collection.
Sets the filter whether to apply to sub directories or not. True includes subdirectories and False ignores them. If value is passed the parameter defaults to Tue.
member.remarks: To ignore file extensions and collect all files found specify the any file extension.

member.name: M:BionicUtilities.NetStandard.IO.FilePathFilter.FilterFilePathsFromMixedPathsIgnoringFolders(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},BionicUtilities.NetStandard.IO.FileExtensions)
member.summary: Extracts valid paths or paths with a specified extension from a collection of paths. The path collection can be a mix-up of files and folders. In case the path describes a folder, the filter will ignore it including all containing files.
member.param: A string collection holding folder and/ or file paths filter.
A flagged Enum type that defines one or more extensions to filter from the collection.
member.remarks: To ignore file extensions and collect all files found specify the any file extension.

member.name: E:BionicUtilities.NetStandard.ViewModel.BaseViewModel.PropertyChanged
member.summary: Event fired whenever a child property changes its value.
